Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: keziyami melikitenyochachinini yemiketatelu honewi lakini፡፡ maninyayitunimi hizibi melikitenyawa bemet’alati k’ut’iri asitebabeluti፡፡ kefilachewinimi bekefilu (bet’ifati) asiketateleni፡፡ werewochimi adereginachewi፡፡ lemayaminumi hizibochi (ke’izinetachini) merak’i tegebachewi፡፡
keziyami musanina wenidimuni harunini bete‘amiratachinina begilits’i asireji lakini፡፡
wede feri‘onina wede ch’ifirochu (lakinachewi)፡፡ korumi፡፡ yetenibet’areru hizibochimi neberu፡፡
«bit’eyachinimi lehonu huleti sewochi hizibochachewi le’inya tegezhiwochi honewi salu inaminaleni» alu፡፡
musanimi (negedochu) yimimeru zenidi mets’ihafini be’irigit’i set’enewi፡፡
yemeriyemini lijina inatunimi te‘amiri adereginachewi፡፡ yemedeladelina yeminich’i balebeti wede honechi kefitenya sifirami asit’eganachewi፡፡
inanite melikitenyochi hoyi! ketefek’eduti migibochi bilu፡፡ bego siranimi siru፡፡ ine yemiteserutini hulu ‘awak’i nenyi፡፡
yihichimi (be’anidi amilaki yemameni higigati) anidi menigedi sitihoni hayimanotachihu nati፡፡ inemi getachihu nenyina firunyi፡፡
(keziya teketayochachewi) yehayimanoti negerachewinimi bemekakelachewi kifilifilochi adirigewi k’oraret’u፡፡ hizibi hulu inerisu zenidi balewi hayimanoti tedesachochi nachewi፡፡
isike gizeyachewimi diresi bet’imimetachewi wisit’i tewachewi፡፡
bebego negerochi yeminichakolilachewi mehonini (yasibaluni) ayidelemi፤ (lemazenigati mehonuni) ayawik’umi፡፡
ineziya inerisu getachewini kemefirati yetenesa tech’enak’iwochi yehonuti፡፡
